title: Should I get Kled?
body: I'm far too much of a casual gamer to care about his mechanics at this stage, I hate Kled but I JUST LOVE SKARL OMG LOOK AT HIM, THAT FACE IS THE FACE OF PURE JOY OMG SOMEONE BUY ME A SKARL

replies.body: I personally think he's a really fun character. I don't think he is competitive, but I find him really fun to play.
Nah don't bother. He's not as amazing as you think.

> [{quoted}](name=DannyMac,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=E9JdbvdE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-04T07:12:21.506+0000)
>
> Nah don't bother. He's not as amazing as you think.

"I'm far too much of a casual gamer to care about his mechanics at this stage"
